notesStmt.note: Reprints and answers Jacob, Henry. "A defence of the churches and ministery of Englande" (STC 14335)--Cf. STC.

In two treatises (register and pagination are continuous). The second treatise has a separate dated title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
